summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the sale of the Arctic Building; declaring property at 700 Third Avenue, commonly known as the Arctic Building, under the jurisdiction of the Fleets and Facilities Department, to be surplus to the City's needs; authorizing the sale and a temporary leaseback of certain portions of said property; designating the disposition of sale proceeds; and making appropriations of sale proceeds; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
